component.name: Rclone Manager
component.summary: Cross-platform User Friendly UI for rclone

description.p: RClone Manager is a cross-platform GUI application to help users manage Rclone remotes with a modern interface. A unique mix of GTK styling, Angular Material, and FontAwesome, creating a minimalist yet modern look.
Built with Angular + Tauri (Rust), this free and open-source application provides an intuitive interface for managing your cloud storage remotes with ease.

ul.li: 🎨 User-Friendly Theme – Clean, intuitive interface designed for ease of use, making remote management accessible for everyone
🛠 Remote Management – Add, edit, and delete remotes easily with support for nearly all Rclone remotes (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, S3, and many more)
🔐 OAuth Support – Authenticate with popular providers effortlessly
🔑 Encrypted Configuration File Support – Keep your remotes safe with optional encryption
⚙️ Advanced VFS Options – Tune caching, read sizes, and other performance options
🖥 Tray Icon Support – Quick access to your remotes from the system tray
🌗 Light & Dark Modes – GTK-inspired themes with a modern, responsive layout
📁 File Browser – Browse and manage files across your remotes
🔄 Sync, Copy, Mount – Full support for rclone operations including mounting remotes (Needs flatpak spawn access)
📊 Job Management – Track and manage your rclone operations
🚀 Cross-Platform – Works seamlessly on Windows, Linux, and macOS
